description: The round payoff this round was 118. You, John chose to play option 1.Kate chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of 0.
Choosing option 1 while the other player chooses option 2 results in a total loss for the player who chose option 1
The game has a strategic element where players must consider the potential choices of their opponent to maximize their own payoff
The payoff structure incentivizes players to potentially choose option 2 to gain a higher payoff if they believe the other player will choose option 1
There is a risk associated with choosing option 1, as it can lead to a complete loss if the opponent opts for option 2
The game dynamics suggest a need for players to adapt their strategies based on previous rounds and the actions of their opponent
